"Dang it!" You didn't know how much longer you could take the safety bar digging into your new belly. Luckily the ride had come to an end with the safety bar rising to it's normal position. You hop off and pat your belly, "Ugh, I didn't think I could stand it much longer."

You were quite the stickler for keeping track of things that made you appear special, that one thing was the first time visitor sticker you got from entering the park.

Craning your head left and right, you try to spot the yellow badge. You look back in your seat and all around, until you spot the sticker on the behind of a fine girl. Her long blond hair fashioned into a ponytail and a red baseball cap on her head, it was hard to see a face. She adjusts the plain white t-shirt and pitch black yoga pants on her fatty figure. 1313.content:
"Hey! How the heck did this happen?" you ask feeling over your fattened form. Even with such a wild imagination at your age you knew things like weren't possible. Despite that though you think it's kind of cool that the change happened. It's just that-

"You don't know about this place do you?", you turn to the right and see a freckle faced girl smiling at you. She extends her hand out, "I'm Meghan and you are..." You say your name and she kindly shakes your small hand. Even though Meghan was much older than you, about twenty years old, she still stood at the same height as you 5'2 and with your widened state she still had thicker legs and a considerable waist that matches yours, "I've read up on this place quite a lot. So I'm pretty knowledgable."

You look around the restaurant and look at the different expansions and transformations happening to the other customers, "So you know something about this place and why people come here...and what's happening to them?"

Meghan nodded her head causing her red locks to flow along, "Yup. I'll be able to tell you about this place and the secrets here. Only if you get me a medium sized gut buster burger meal," she said licking her lips, "I wanna see what being chubby is like."

She folded her fingers as you heft your obese form to the counter, "Hi. I'd like a medium sized gut buster meal."

-

Delicious. The last sip of bubbly cola passed her lips. She leaned back in her chair and patted her belly. Even though her torso was clothed in a baggy hoodie you could clearly see in it her face that she had plumped up quite nicely. Meghan gets up from her seat, "Let's walk and talk."

She heads out of the restaurant with you struggling to keep up from behind her. You definitely see the gain in her waist and legs. Her waist had become much wider and in result had greatly increased her lower body. With her clothes growing along with her in the gain her acid washed jeans appeared skin tight. Meghan struggled to walk properly, with her legs wobbling at the slightest and her butt jutting out farther than usual.
1313.title: An explanation

choices: Basketball: winner gains 6 inches of height
Wac-a-animal: winner changes into an animal
13133.content:
Meghan pats her sides, "I feel so fluffy." One hand explored her belly flesh. She felt around it for a while, "This is so new." Meghan sighed with a tinge of excitement in her voice. You stand there, somewhat mesmerized about the impressive girth of this chicks lower half. She continues to feel around with her fat when a circus kart drives by playing the classic circus tune.

"Hey, how's about we play some Carnival Games? You're buying right?" Megan says. Before you get the chance to mention your need for an explanation of this place, Meghan had already walked off towards the Carnival section of the Amusement Park. With not many options to choose. You decide to follow her into the Carnival.

The bright lights and music excites you. You've never been to a Carnival before. You just saw a few on TV and the internet, however, this particular carnival blows those out of the water by a mile. You look around, through the crowd of patrons and find Megan standing at a booth. She turns around and waves at you with her chunky arm.

"Hey! There you are! How's about we play this game?"

"Bu-But what about the explanation of-"

"Yeah. Yeah. I'll get to it after this game of...now pay up! Come on!"

You look up at the sign and see that this particular booth has a game of...
13133.title: Carnival Games of Change

131331.content:
"Basketball! I love shooting hoops." she grabbed you by the hand and led you on. Her strides were accompanied by the swaying of her big birthing hips. You know you shouldn't be looking like that, yet how could you not? The buttcheeks stretching the limits of her pants jostled wildly around. Clearly uncontested by anyone except Kim Kardashian.

"Do you mind paying? I'm kinda broke right now." Meghan's sincere smile with her chipmunk cheeks forced your hand to dig inside your pocket and pull out a few wadded bills.

"One game only." The carnie said handing the pair basketballs. "Two-minute time limit. Whoever scores the most points wins. On your mark. Get set. Go!"

Instantly the two of you start shooting the basketballs at the hoops. Some misses, some airballs, some swishes. From the way you two were neck and neck with a total of zero points. You assumed she had to be at the same skill level as you with basketball: AWFUL.

Either way, it was the last ten seconds of the game and whoever would make the next basket would win the height. You look over at Meghan who's clearly exhausted from the minimal exercise. Sweat poured from her body and dampened her shirt forcing it to cling onto her blubber. You were the same. Exhausted, out of breath, and sweaty.

Looking at the basket. You shoot the ball upward as it arcs toward the hoop. Seconds on the clock count down as it nears the goal. Meghan, had also taken her last minute shot. Both balls were closing their distance with the hoop. The carnie looks at the hoop, holding the same anticipation he's been holding for however long he's been doing this.

Then. Swish. A ball made it in.

"We have a winner!"

As it turns out...

133.content:
I watched as the worker, a kid with greasy blonde hair, snatched a taco shell from a full bin. The door slammed just as another shell started tumbling out on its own.
"Uh? Hey? Can I please have my taco?" I tried to be as polite as I was trying to sound. The blonde kid tirned toward me and I saw "it" was a girl. I didn't know why I felt relieved.
"Yeah! YOU know where I'm coming from! Just fix me my taco!"
She grimaced threateningly at me. Then smiled. Her upper teeth missing allowed her tongue to flick and flip out like a crazy reptile. I tossed a five onto the counter,
"Look, Just give me my taco? Keep the change!" I grabbed my tray holding my one taco and a soda.
"Sure! You're gonna LOVE the special surprise!" The worker looked hard at me through an attitude that was hard to read. I reflexively glanced down at my taco and saw something moving!
133.title: the gender bender taco

what is happening
1341.title: Stick with Super Shrinking soup

choices: Find a way to get big again
13411.content:
You start to feel your clothes hanging off your body more, while the chair your are sitting in starts feel larger on your dwindling bottom. The table with the soup on it seems to get further away as your feet leave the ground, dangling from the chair. Your shoes and socks are the first to go as they slide off your feet and hit the floor, while your once form fitting khaki shorts and shirt feel several sizes too larger.

You think about yelling for help, but then think to yourself, "Maybe its best not to attract attention right now, I'll just see how small I get first."
Most people would think this foolish, however the tingling that your shrinking body is feeling is slightly arousing, which overcomes your voice of reason.

With this mental debate going on, you've now reached the size of a small child, with your line of sight not even able to see over the table anymore. Your struggle to hold on to your shorts and underwear becomes a lost cause, as the weight of holding them becomes too much, sending them falling off the chair to the floor. Your pile of clothes on the floor is pretty messy now, as your try to stand up in a shirt that feels more like a giant blanket than a once comfortable piece of clothing. Distracted by your surroundings and deep in your thoughts, your shirt causes your to loose your balance as you tumble down off the chair and land in the pile at the foot of it, cushioning your fall.

The tingling feeling throughout your body finally ceases, as you emerge from the clothes into a new, larger world. Everything looks massive, from the table and chairs to the other people around you, who have not noticed the now naked foot tall young man in shock at his new perceptive.

"Get ahold of yourself, I need to find a way to get big again, maybe that clerk might have something," the rational thought says, however your more adventurous side thinks,"Maybe this could be fun, I would like to see the rest of this place at this size."

With the two sides of your personality at war with one another, the final decision is...
13411.title: you shrink

1511.content: as you walk bown the hallway there are bones crunching under your feet. you are fealing very hot like you are wearing a halloween costume. something is geting infront of your eyes it feels like rubber but weren't wearing a costume what is going on here. as you get to the end of the hallway you see a
1511.title: the boney hallway

choices: You decide to follow him and look at the costumes.
You decide to sneak away while he's distracted.
15113.content:
You stumble out of the Bone Hallway, feeling unusually warm. Strangely, it feels like you’re wearing a costume, even though you weren’t. You reach up to wipe your brow, only to be greeted by what feels like rubber, unnerving you. Even more disturbingly, as you look down at your hands, you notice they seem different somehow, like gloves almost. You shake your head. That’s impossible, you think; the haunted mansion must just be getting to you. Still, it feels unnerving, and your skin feels unusually itchy.

Finally reaching the end of the hall, still a bit nervous, you’re surprised as you see a mirror hanging on the wall. Hopefully that would assuage your fears, right? There was still a sense of trepidation as you walked up to it. You weren’t sure you wanted to see, but you took a peek anyway.

For a few minutes, you thought you looked normal, and were relieved. Then you took a closer look. Your skin looked paler somehow, and rubbery. And your eyes seemed wider somehow. In fact, you thought there was something underneath them. Cautiously, you reach up, and pick at the dark space, only to feel it peel away from your face. Not off your ‘face’ itself, but apart from something underneath, and your breath tightened. The skin on your face was like a mask, a mask that you had slowly begun peeling off. You stared in disbelief as your finger pulled at the hole where your eye socket was, before suddenly it ripped, peeling down the side of your mask-like old face, revealing something else beneath; reddish scales where your skin should’ve been. You backed away in a panic, before hearing another tear from your side.

A nail jutted from the wall beside you, which seemed to have gotten hooked on your clothes. In fact, upon closer inspection, it dug into your flesh, or what was your flesh, peeling back what used to be your skin, exposing monstrous, reptilian scales. You stared, horrified as you pulled at the fabric, exposing more of what was underneath. You ripped off the skin across your stomach, causing a bloated, reptilian belly to bulge out, somewhat like a crocodile’s. What was happening to you?! Your skin was now a costume! Even your hands were gloves, which sharp nails quickly jutted out the fingertips. You took one last glance into the mirror, seeing the remains of your old face hanging limply around some beast’s. You couldn’t believe it, but it looked like you were a monster.

You heard a tutting from off to the side, and turned to look, seeing another unbelievable sight. A large, green skinned man, with horns jutting from his bald head. He didn’t look human, and it didn’t look like he was wearing a costume either. He was like an orc, fat, green, and disgustingly slimy, with lumpy skin, varicose veins, and oozing sores, wearing a surprisingly dapper, if ill-fitting suit. He smelled awful, like sewage. The fat monster approached from the shadows as you backed away in fear, unable to process what was going on. He suddenly spoke, with a bone-chillingly deep, gravely voice, “Well, well, seems you accidentally tore your human skin.”, he sounded vaguely sympathetic as he grabbed the tattered remains of your old skin and clothing, and ripped it off your torso, showing off more of your new scales as he looked at it. You could only gawk at him before finally blurting out, “W-Who are you…? What’s going on? What’s happening?”

The monster stopped, “Don’t worry boy, my name is Costington. I’m here to help.”, “Help…?” You muttered, afraid of what ‘help’ was. “Yep, your old human skin was getting a bit worn out boy. Judging by the smell, it’s a bit past it’s expiration date.” He disgustingly took a few sniffs of it, before recoiling, “How long have you had this?”, “Er, my whole life?” You said, confused, causing Costington’s eyes to widen, “Well, it’s definitely in need of replacing then.” You watched, horrified and repulsed as Costington suddenly ate the skin and clothing he held in his hands, slurping it up into his large, fanged mouth, letting out a large BURRRRRP as he was finished, and wiped away saliva with his sleeve. “Well, no worries. I’ve got just the thing. Follow me.” The fat monster grabbed your scaly hand and pulled you down a second corridor, despite your reluctance. Soon, you found yourself outside what looked like a costume shop? In the middle of a haunted house?

Costington gestured proudly, “Costington’s Costumes, fitting monsters of all sizes into any disguises.” You stared in disbelief. “W-Wait, monsters? What’s going on. Just a second ago, I was human. Then I came here and… this place…. And my skin.” Costington chuckled, “You must be confused. Well, you can drop the act. You’re among your own kind now.” He laughed, “We’ve been disguising ourselves as humans for the longest time. But inevitably these disguises can wear down, particularly one of such cheap quality like your own, and inevitably they eventually just rip apart. I’m surprised it didn’t do it sooner honestly, but you needn’t worry, I’ll get you a new one.” He peeled a piece of your old ‘skin’ off your scaly face and ate it, chuckling again, while you were still struggling to wrap your mind around it.

Costington dragged you into the store, where you could see what initially looked like other humans, before you noticed they were all standing completely still on top of platforms, and you realized they were probably just mannequins dressed up like humans. The clothing racks all had skins hanging on wires, and there were packages lined up, like Halloween costumes, except showing off rather mundane individuals. It even smelled like cheap rubber costumes in a Halloween store (apart from the uncomfortable stench Costington was giving off that is). Costington just smiled, barring a mouth full of razor-sharp teeth that made you cringe, “Welcome.” He said, practically bouncing over to one of the racks and motioning you to follow him, “I think you’ll be delighted in our wide selection of human disguises. We fit all kinds. And our skins have been very well preserved, of course, we get new arrivals daily, freshly peeled.” You didn’t think you wanted to think over that last part as you stumbled around, disturbed at the sight of human skin on hooks around the lair. Costington held up a few from a rack that he observed, “Of course, your old one has been out of production for a while, dunno when we’ll see it again, but hey, we got plenty of other good ones. They’re much less restrictive too.”, “Less restrictive?” You asked.

Costington poked your new chubby belly, “Well of course. We plus sized monsters need some special care after all. Even if you want one that’s skinny, if it’s not roomy enough, it’ll feel too constriction, leading to discomfort, and probably rip too.” He laughed, “But don’t worry, if you still want a ‘slim’ look, I think I can accommodate. Of course, we’ll have to see what I have in stock. There’s been an increasing demand for big-fitting skins lately, so no promises.” Costington rambled as you stood, uncomfortably. You weren’t sure what had happened, or what you should be doing now. You weren’t even sure you trusted him. Costington grabbed a few more off the rack, “Hmm…” He said, “Well, let’s see what we can scourge up. I’m certain there’s something here you’ll like. Give me a moment to set up a few models, and I’ll be back.” He chuckled as he darted off to a back room with the skins, leaving you standing in the costume shop, uncertain about everything going on. This wasn’t right though; you knew you weren’t a monster. But what should you do about your current predicament?
15113.title: Mirror, Mirror; and Costington's Costumes

choices: Go down the vortex tunnel hallway
Turn around and go back down the slimy hallway
1512.content:
The bone-filled hallway seemed too ominous, and the other smelled too nauseating, so you decided to go down the slime-covered corridor in the center, deeming it the lesser of the three evils; or the option that would lead to less potential injury to yourself anyway.

The whole hallway an eerie glow, and bright green slime slowly crept down the stained walls perpetually onto the cobblestone floor; which looked more like a mud slick than anything now. It stunk, not as bad as the other corridor, but the slime seemed to be giving off a funky smell, and it was strangely, and uncomfortably, hot and humid as well. Taking a few cautious steps forward, you find that the floor is slicker than you thought, and struggle to balance yourself and avoid falling face-first into the ooze. Your shoes are already coated in the gunk, and disgustingly squelch with each step forward. You look around, and see a guardrail along the wall. At least it has though you supposed, and you instinctively grab it, only the find the rail is also coated in a thick layer of slime.

You quickly withdraw your hand, seeing sticky strands of stringy goo peeling away from your fingertips, and stare at your slime-covered palm in disgust. “Ick. Gross…” You mumble as you start to wipe if off on your jeans, only to realize that, as disgusting as it is, holding onto the handrail is probably the only way you’ll make it down the hall without tripping and falling repeatedly into gunk, and getting yourself even dirtier. Might as well keep holding on and hope they have paper towels for afterwards. You quickly remove your hand, only to see a dark green print of it on your pants and angrily curse to yourself. That’s definitely going to stain. And the goo on your hand didn’t even come off. Well, there are probably bathrooms here, so hopefully you can wash it off later.

Grasping the rail again, cringing as you feel gunk ooze between your fingers, you trudge on through the slime, going further down the hall. The sludge still squishes unpleasantly under your shoes, and your hand only gets slimier as it slides along the rail. You weren’t sure what was at the end of the hall, but hopefully it’d be more tolerable. Of course, as soon as you think that, some ooze drops down onto your head, and you cringe at the cold, viscous substance in your hair, dribbling down your face and shirt. “Aw, damnit!” You angrily cuss as you try to get it off. So much for trying to stay clean you guess. You pulled away the gummy substance in revulsion and try to shake it off. For some reason it seems to be sticking to you. Your free hand still feels slimy, and even though you try, some of the gel still clings to your hair desperately. It all oozes down your face, onto the front of your shirt, covering it in dark green slimy stains. Great, you’ll definitely need a bath when you get home. You attempt to wipe it off your face, but it still seems to stay sticky; and accidentally end up wiping your free hand on your pants, with the same results as last time, leaving another big stain. Grumbling, you reluctantly trudge on. The sooner out of here, the better.

You don’t realize that your body has slowly begun changing. For some reason, your clothes feel a bit tighter, but you just dismiss it as nerves and continue on. The slimy stains spread across, making your shirt and pants looser, and significantly dirtier, to accommodate a slowly expanding midsection. Your slime-covered hands start to look a bit more swollen; which just travels up your arms, making them puffier too. Suddenly you start to notice that the hallway is seemingly even more humid now. Was it always this hot? You huff, walking further. Although you haven’t been walking too long, you still feel strangely out of breath, and particularly sweaty. Sweat drips down your sides and down your red face as you pant. Something felt definitely off. You had to get out of there; the heat felt like it was killing you, but you couldn’t run, lest you slip into the… suddenly very refreshing-seeming slime. As cool as it felt against your hand, it didn’t seem like that long a walk to the end, so you mustered your strength and plowed on, hot and sweaty as you were.

You absentmindedly ran your slimy hand through your hair, which had suddenly become thick and greasy, though somehow you didn’t fully care. In fact, all of you felt disgustingly greasy and disturbingly damp. You couldn’t see your cheeks puffing out with each breath, your neck and chin plumping up and outwards as red pimples began forming across your face. Your arms, and your whole body, somehow felt so much heavier now, as your clothes shifted too, becoming even sweatier and filthier. Your shirt became a filthy, sweat and food stained sleeveless T, while your jeans became ripped up and equally dirty. Your shoes seemed to take the most drastic change, melting down around your socks, which became hole-filled and dark with sweat, turning into a pair of flip-flops and leaving your feet to be exposed to more disgustingly squishy, yet somehow cooling slime. You couldn’t remember wearing socks with sandals, but somehow it felt… right… Not that you could see them anymore if you looked down. Your gut had ballooned even further. It expanded outward, draping across your new shorts like a apron; a true waterfall of flab. Still exhausted from the walk, you obliviously rubbed the blubber with your hand, coating it in more greasy sludge and feeling it squish and jiggle, uncontrollably moaning as you did. Your chest had equally fattened, tuning into two massive moobs that rested on the overflowing potbelly. Sweat flowed down the slippery fat rolls and flab by your side from your dank armpits, forming huge stains in your new dirty shirt. You were so exhausted. Although a small part of your mind felt that this was wrong. “Oh god…’ You moaned, “What’s happening to-BWOOOOOOOORRRRRRRPPP-me?!” You yelled, uncontrollably belching as you waddled towards the end of the corridor. Suddenly there was a pain in your gargantuan gut that made you pause, “Oh god….URRRRP-no!” You belched uncontrollably again, before bracing yourself, bending over and ripping an enormous, 15-second long trumpeting fart that seemed to shake the walls.

FFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTT TTTTTTTTTTTTTTT

You sighed in relief, yet reeled in disgust and embarrassment at what you just did. It smelled awful, although you didn’t think you had eaten anything before now. And somehow, as much as it stunk, you didn’t care, still trying to catch your breath from being overheated, you still huffed it, noting, to your dismay, it became more and more bearable with each sniff. “What’s… happening… to…. me?!” You panted, trying to resume your escape. You wanted out ASAP. Although it didn’t end there, with another few waddling steps forwards, sending your massive belly swaying, you felt another gurgle, and this time lifted up your leg, releasing another booming blast of gas that filled the room with an even greater stink.

BBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRMMMPPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT TT

You scrounged your face in disgust. “Ugh, why am I so gassy…?” You muttered, noticing you were slurring your words a bit. That didn’t matter though; you were almost at the end of the hallway now. Huffing and panting, you managed to make it to the threshold into a large chamber. A few more farts and belches escaped as you stopped for breath; panting and extremely sweaty. Your B.O. was almost as pungent as your flatulence. You gag as you waddle further, noticing a large mirror on the wall, and seeing, to your disbelief, the massive, gross, sweaty, greasy slob that you now were in it. Your face was riddled in red zits. Your hair was tangled, matted, and slimy. Your ill-fitting clothes were stretched, torn, covered in stains and looked like they hadn’t been washed in ages. And of course was your newfound obesity. You were as big as a whale, a true lardass, probably the fattest person you’d ever seen. Fat skin drooped down, particularly on your apron belly, which was like a waterfall of disgusting flab. Everything about you seemed greasy and slimy, like there was some sort of film over you that left your pale skin even more discolored.

“Oh god, no… No, no, no…” You whimpered, gazing, repulsed at he sight, “What the hell happened to me?!” As you moaned that, there was another gurgle in your massive belly, followed by another particularly loud and grotesque fart from your ass. BLLLLLLRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTT. You whimpered, not sure how this had happened or why, but there had to be some way to undo this. You were a complete slob now!

Desperate, you looked around the rest of the chamber. There were two other hallways on either side. One, dyed an eerie red, had claw marks and animal heads on the walls. The other, dyed blue, was a vortex tunnel—a steel walkway through a moving spiral, which seemed to draw you in. Besides them, there was also the slime tunnel you had come in at. You weren’t sure what would happen going down any of them, but anything would be better than being a fat slob like this, right?
1512.title: Slimy Slobbishness

1542.content:
like your normal self you start snooping around the store looking for some thing that you like. The girl at the counter seemed to be busy with something so wander to the back of the store and see some dusty books and boxes one of the books say "how to be a witch/warlock", one of the kits say "your secret wish granted" and there is a VERY large kit that says make your own magic potions. As you were looking around you didn't notice the cute girl from the counter walk up behind you "see any thing you like?" she aked. "Yes" you reply "but i can't decide what to buy". "Well" she said "why don't you let me help you pick then i do work here, i would recomend the ................"

what did she recomend?
1542.title: ¿Are they real?

choices: Stick with going to the midway of doom
Try one of the interesting foods
155.content: Do you go to the midway of doom or do you do something else?
155.title: the midway of doom

info.brief_description: An amusement park that you never leave the same way you came
info.description:
This is my first story so i am looking forward to what you guys post to it
so this is your basic transformation story only it is in an amusement park

i would like to lay down some rules:
the main character is a boy who WILL NOT be killed
no sex or any related content
you can change into a girl but no super in depth explanation

remember it is an amusement park so no just spontaneous change you have to ride a ride or play a midway game hay you could even eat some food from he restaurant but keep to the rules or i will delete it from the story
